file_content.text: See, Father. We stand against Dusk Shadow, and survive. Is sign from Scorekeeper.
Little one did not understand. Why explosives and tricks, when there is skill? When Scorekeeper rewards keeping to true path?
Father's bones will stay, in deserts he loved. We return to ship, Herald; is own hunt to continue.
Yes. Is father's bones. We have found.
Scorekeeper, I am soft thing compared to father. But I honor prey, and score, and hunt, as he honored. Please forgive.
Not even the Scorekeeper could resist.
I'm sure she will.
Has that made any difference?
Do you feel better?
Please finish quickly, I'd rather not stand out in the open too long.
We should hurry this up.
I feel lightness. Shame sloughing off. Yes. This was right to do.
Had... forgotten. I am older than father was at death. Many changes coming for me.
I--we continue later. Someone comes.
What do you do here? Leave! You spoil everything!
Qyzen and I have come to honor his father's remains. May we have some privacy?
You're interrupting us.
I'd like to know your name.
There's an entire planet of dunes out there; kindly go somewhere else.
Find your own patch of desert.
No! Go or whole hunt is ruined!
I am Lek Svaal. Finest hunter on Tatooine! I seek creature that wanders here.
Must have moved into territory, since father killed other beasts.
Farmers say it eats bantha herds. Call it the Dusk Shadow. Has claimed many hunters, but I will kill.
That still doesn't explain why we have to go; we haven't seen your Dusk Shadow.
But why must we leave?
If this Dusk Shadow is so fearsome, you shouldn't be out here alone.
Hunting it alone is foolish.
I am no hatchling. I am great hunter!
Self-confidence isn't bad, but overconfidence will get you killed.
That seems rather arrogant.
I laid scent trail to lure Dusk Shadow, dug trapfall in sand, filled with explosives. Is perfect plan.
Even Dusk Shadow will not survive. But you disrupt scent trail by standing here!
Explosives? That is not hunt, little one. Hunter trusts to weapons and strength, and Scorekeeper's favor.
Indeed. If you want the glory of a hunt, you must earn it.
Qyzen is right.
I... I will earn by strength of mind. I have planned....
Even if these charges go off, you can't predict what aftershocks they could cause.
And explosives are risky.
Is perfect plan. Is! I have thought of all!
If this kills the Dusk Shadow safely, I see nothing wrong with it.
No, Lek has the right idea.
No points for tricks and dishonor, Herald. Is kill for no reason.
No, too late, is all ruined! I scent Dusk Shadow. Run!
[This pile of bones has been scoured by the desert.]
